snippet: Brendan Shanahan, the Toronto franchise’s new president, is no stranger to winning: He raised three Stanley Cups while playing for the Detroit Red Wings and has an Olympic gold medal.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Toronto Maple Leafs hope Brendan Shanahan, new team president who is both a hometown hero and veteran hockey champion, will revive team's fortunes; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Brendan Shanahan, the Toronto franchise’s new president, is no stranger to winning: He raised three Stanley Cups while playing for the Detroit Red Wings and has an Olympic gold medal.

headline.main: Maple Leafs Turn to Shanahan to Give Team Identity
headline.print_headline: Maple Leafs Turn to Shanahan to Give Team Identity
